author: Paul F
title: Hospitality at it's best
text:
The Sofitel Paris Le Faubourg is probably the best kept secret in Paris. Perfectly located at the very heart of Paris, on the corner of St-Honore Street, The Sofitel Le Faubourg puts you front row in the heart of arguably the greatest high end shopping district in the world. Not interested in indulging in high-end fashion, no problem; just turn right from the front entrance and you will find yourself at Place de la Concorde, your gateway to the incredible city of Paris. The Louvres, The Eiffel Tower, Les Champs Elysees, l'Arc de Triomphe, all within a short walking distance from the Sofitel Le Faubourg. Simply unbeatable...
The hotel proposes each guest with a red carpet welcome and this experience is carried throughout your entire stay, right until you step into the taxi on your way out. The Bar Le Faubourg offers an intimate cozy, art-deco rich getaway where I often find myself enjoying a glass of champagne or a perfectly prepared Martini whilst preparing my next business meeting (if I am alone), or alternatively, the next place to visit in Paris when I am with my Family. Accommodations are wonderful, rooms have always been absolutely spotless, room/turn-down service is impeccable. The only issue are the beds; they are so comfortable, you may experience delays getting out of them in the morning :-)...
Sofitel Paris Le Faubourg is the sole reason I have chosen to be a Member of the Accor Group. It is an outstanding property, in an outstanding location within an outstanding district, in an outstanding world capital city. No matter what brings you to Paris, business or pleasure, make sure you bring yourself to the Sofitel Paris Le Faubourg. You will never regret it, you will never forget it.
Room Tip: The hotel is on a quiet, exceptional street. Any room is perfect. Family of three or more, consider... See more room tips
